settings.title: Settings
settings.maxNodesSubtitle: Set an upper limit for the number of nodes on the map (default: 250).
settings.maxNodesWarning: You probably don't want to do that unless you are absolutely sure you have a good reason for it.
settings.offlineModeSubtitle: Disable all network requests except for local/offline areas.
settings.offlineModeWarningMessage: Enabling offline mode will cancel any active area downloads. Do you want to continue?
settings.offlineSettingsSubtitle: Manage offline mode and downloaded areas
settings.advancedSettingsSubtitle: Performance, alerts, and tile provider settings

node.title: Node #{}
node.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete node #{}? This action cannot be undone.

addNode.profileNoDirectionInfo: This profile does not require a direction.
addNode.mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to submit new nodes. Please log in via Settings.
addNode.enableSubmittableProfile: Enable a submittable profile in Settings to submit new nodes.
addNode.profileViewOnlyWarning: This profile is for map viewing only. Please select a submittable profile to submit new nodes.

editNode.title: Edit Node #{}
editNode.profileNoDirectionInfo: This profile does not require a direction.
editNode.mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to edit nodes. Please log in via Settings.
editNode.sandboxModeWarning: Cannot submit edits on production nodes to sandbox. Switch to Production mode in Settings to edit nodes.
editNode.enableSubmittableProfile: Enable a submittable profile in Settings to edit nodes.
editNode.profileViewOnlyWarning: This profile is for map viewing only. Please select a submittable profile to edit nodes.

download.title: Download Map Area
download.offlineModeWarning: Downloads disabled while in offline mode. Disable offline mode to download new areas.
download.downloadStarted: Download started! Fetching tiles and nodes...

uploadMode.title: Upload Destination
uploadMode.subtitle: Choose where cameras are uploaded
uploadMode.productionDescription: Upload to the live OSM database (visible to all users)
uploadMode.sandboxDescription: Uploads go to the OSM Sandbox (safe for testing, resets regularly).
uploadMode.simulateDescription: Simulate uploads (does not contact OSM servers)

queue.sandboxMode: Sandbox mode – uploads go to OSM Sandbox
queue.uploadFailedRetry: Upload failed. Tap retry to try again.

tileProviders.title: Tile Providers
tileProviders.deleteProviderConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{}"?
tileProviders.apiKeyHint: Enter API key if required by tile types
tileProviders.atLeastOneTileTypeRequired: At least one tile type is required

profiles.deleteProfileConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{}"?

profileEditor.requiresDirectionSubtitle: Whether cameras of this type need a direction tag
profileEditor.submittableSubtitle: Whether this profile can be used for camera submissions
profileEditor.atLeastOneTagRequired: At least one tag is required

operatorProfiles.title: Operator Profiles
operatorProfiles.noProfilesMessage: No operator profiles defined. Create one to apply operator tags to node submissions.
operatorProfiles.deleteOperatorProfileConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{}"?

offlineAreas.title: Offline Areas
offlineAreas.noAreasSubtitle: Download a map area for offline use.
offlineAreas.refreshAreaDialogSubtitle: Choose what to refresh for this area:
offlineAreas.refreshTilesSubtitle: Re-download all tiles for updated imagery
offlineAreas.refreshNodesSubtitle: Re-fetch node data for this area

refineTagsSheet.title: Refine Tags
refineTagsSheet.noTagsDefinedForProfile: No tags defined for this operator profile.
refineTagsSheet.noOperatorProfilesMessage: Create operator profiles in Settings to apply additional tags to your node submissions.

layerSelector.cannotChangeTileTypes: Cannot change tile types while downloading offline areas
